name: redeploy
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool maytapi_whatsapp.
Tool description: Send and receive messages from WhatsApp via Maytapi. It is a stable and reliable solution. See more:  https://maytapi.com/
API description: Redeploys a Docker instance of the specified phone. This function can be used to reboot the instance if the phone is experiencing unexpected problems.

phone_id.description: The unique identifier of the phone whose Docker instance is to be redeployed.
